zh.title: 快速开始
zh.content: 本指南将帮助你快速上手文档系统，了解基本配置和使用方法。

zh.title: 安装指南
zh.content: 详细介绍如何安装和部署文档系统到 GitHub Pages。

en.title: Getting Started
en.content: This guide will help you get started with the documentation system.

en.title: Installation
en.content: Learn how to install and deploy the documentation system to GitHub Pages.
